messages.message:
1) Is there a ticket open to allow projects to be copyable during read-only mode?

Example - we had a few folks open a Build project today to copy into their own space to make edits - unfortunately they had to do it one at a time because one person would take the write mode which prevents copying

2) Are there any plans to be able to set user permissions to read-only for a workspace? This would help with the above too where we only want a user to access projects to read information/copy the project into their personal workspace
fyi @suleiman.odat @Badri good to note for CorSo, believe they also wanted to make copies of the projects and edit

@Ben Hope for 2- we are planning to introduce a Tester role as part of this initiative (coming ~late Q1), which will have read-only access to projects: https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-2388

Full details of the planned permissions for that role & other new human review roles can be found in this table: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1xPMeaq-SZnAQW4pRSJbxjqfwIr4i1qs-8A4Lbd_9lMM/edit?tab=t.0#bookmark=id.g9md4gbtu9o1

for (1), that’s a good catch! @danny.lan we can allow copying projects if the user has read-only access to the shared project, right?

i’ll create an improvement ticket - fyi @Kaustubh (KD) since this will go on your improvements board
